name: Burlington Palm Hotel

reviews.text: I stayed for a sewing event over the weekend and had a wonderful time. The staff were excellent and very professional, the food was well cooked, piping hot and an excellent range to suit anyone at breakfast and evening meal. My room was generously sized with a small but adequate TV. The room had a bath and shower over and a kettle and tea making facilities. The bed was very comfortable. I was lucky enough to have a sea view and the parking was easy and free. The hotel has an indoor pool. The bar snacks were very nice promptly delivered and reasonably priced. A little road noise but not to intrusive.
reviews.title: Excellent stay- lovely staff- clean rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for three days to play whist in this very pleasant hotel. We had an executive double room which had a massive bed, large modern television and lovely sea views. The bathroom with its pink suite was very dated but everything was nice and clean.
reviews.title: Very pleasant stay

reviews.text: The walls were not very thick as we were kept awake by someone in the next room snoring loudly most of the night but of course, that was not the fault of the hotel.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel, BUT............

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As every other reviewer has stated, the food here cannot be faulted. Every night there was a varied menu, something for everyone. The food was served quickly, was always hot and of the highest standard. Breakfast too had a good choice.We couldn't fault the restaurant in any way.
reviews.title: Renovation needed!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went swimming in the pool one afternoon and everything was spotless.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised

description: Family run Hotel on Great Yarmouth Seafront. Close to all attractions and the only Hotel in Great Yarmouth with a heated indoor indoor swimming pool. A Great base to explore the Norfolk Broads and Coastline with miles of beaches. Executive rooms, Standard Doubles, Sea views, singles and family rooms available.
